features: 🚀New Styles and Games：The appearance of this game console is brand new. Built-in 100 new exciting educational puzzle casual games. And while kids having fun, they're exercising important developing skills too, like hand-eye coordination, and thinking and problem solving skills.

🚀Larger and Clearer Screen: 3.0-inch high-definition display, ensuring portability, while also taking into account the comfort of the games. Not too bulky or too small. Tailored for children, Of course, as an adult gamers also can find pleasure in it.In order to prevent the screen from being scratched during production, the screen surface is covered with a protective film. It is normal to have scratches on the protective film. Please tear it off before use.

🚀Rugged Shatterproof: The casing is made of a strong and environmentally friendly plastic. Surface frosted, anti-fingerprint anti-scratch.After a long period of practical use testing, it is enough to withstand the violence of children. We promise that if it accidentally breaks within a month, please send us an email and we will renew it for free.

🚀Uninterrupted Energy: Built-in a rechargeable lithium battery, providing a steady stream of energy for your child's happiness. It also eliminates the parents from buying and replacing batteries frequently.

🚀Absolute Surprise: This game console can definitely surprise you and your child. As a birthday, Christmas, party gifts are very sincere.Our warranty covers any defect caused during product production and delivery. We can offer you full refund or free replacement within 30 days, whichever is at your most convenience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Beijue handheld game console provides a fantastic variety of interesting video games for children, adult and elderly.Rechargeable and 3.0 inches color display,with built in100 16Bit retro games, includes sports, adventure and puzzle games as well as thinking and learning games involving memory, math, and logic. Your kids will love the variety of games and never get bored!As a cool birthday, christmas gift for the kids is really nice.

Special Note In order to prevent the screen from being scratched, we have put a protective film on the screen of each game console, scratches on the surface of the protective film are normal, please tear it off before use.The character name MIKE in the car game (X-RaceⅢ) is preset by the software and is not used by anyone.You can access the full game list via the MINI GAME icon (on the left of the X-Racer Ⅲ icon).

Preloaded with 100 Classic 16 Bit Games Built in 100 different types of games, so that your little sweetheart has enough choices and will not lose interest soon.No need to connect to the Internet, you can prevent your child from touching some information that is not conducive to growth.Preloaded a large variety of puzzles, sports and other games, While entertainment children's Eye-hand coordination and solve problems ability will also be exercised.

Rechargeable,Use Peace of Mind Built-in rechargeable lithium battery,eliminates the hassle of buying and replacing batteries frequently,entertainment kids convenient parents.Using a standard Micro USB charging interface,compatible with most electronic device adapters.Plug and play with power bank even without a battery installed.Charging one hour can play for 4 hours.With low battery reminder function and full-charge indicator color change function (indicator light turns red is full-charge).

A little Guy Who Bring Happy What the child needs most is companionship. It can be as a small friend to accompany the child to grow up.When you have time, you can play with children.If you can play better than them, they will give you a adoring expression. Close the distance between you and your child.Sometimes you will be amazed that your children actually have different talents.This small device can bring different joy to your family!

Irresistible Gift for Kids As a gift, we believe that this little device will not disappoint your child. Package Contains 1 x Game console 1 x User Manual 1 x Li-ion Battery1 x USB CableSpecially designed retail gift box Friendly Reminder Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully. Do not short circuit battery contacts or dispose of batteries in fire.This game console contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 4 years old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for trips
reviews.reviewText: I have a 8 and 10 year old and they love these. They fit in their pockets and can pretty much take them anywhere. They have over 150 games and they charge by micro USB so we can charge them in the go and they also take batteries so they last forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is just awesome!
reviews.reviewText: It's very light, the color on the screen was much better than anticipated for the price. So many super fun games! I cannot wait for my son to open it in Christmas. He'll love it. Hubby even tried to take it and play before I wrapped it LOLI also suggest getting the case (it doesn't come with one). I saw a few under "people also bought".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the purpose I bought it for..
reviews.reviewText: My 5 year old daughter had mentioned she wanted one of these for her birthday. I knew I didn’t wanna spend much because she has a tablet with games and stuff so I figured I’d find something cheap but still entertaining just incase she lost it or it got ran over by another toy in the house. This game console has been perfect. Looking at it it looks very cheap and it is but it has alot of basic games for kids my daughters age so it kept her entertained and the screen is of such crappy quality it was like the 90s again. (We didn’t mind and my daughter didn’t notice “quality of the screen”). The game is still working great. Has been tossed around a few times as well still holding up. If your looking for a cheap game console that you won’t care if your kid ruins..look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works but it’s not great.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never seen these games before. They are very one dimensional and some of them leave me scratching my head trying to figure out how to actually play them. If this was $15, then I’d say fair enough. For the price paid, I wouldn’t buy it again. My 13 and 11 year old played it for a very short time and boxed them back up. I tried to play the games and I can see why they silently expressed their opinion by not using them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and loved by my kids
reviews.reviewText: My kids love this! Their uncle gave one to them and they loved it and were fighting over it so I had to buy another one so they don't fight. I played it and it is easy to use and I love that we can control the sound to it also. Some of the games though were hard to do but that is only because my kids are pretty young to figure it out. So I would just check the age on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth what they are charging for this item…really low end
reviews.reviewText: Only 8 games are functional! The 8 are just ok for a minute or two of play…the buttons aren’t properly labeled so I had to label them myself….bought this for a Grandson as a beginner player…but without the buttons being labeled…it was very hard for him to navigate for a while…. You have to hit Reset to get out of the game, the Select button has not responded to anything, the screen goes black or scrambled on certain games,Also know that it does not come with a USB outlet cube, so you’ll need to invest in oneThis is a Misrepresented item…. I did contact Amazon…and they gave me 50% back on the price and I did not have to return it…if I wanted to return it, they would have taken it back and given me a full refund…but I am a 24/7 care giver of my dying husband and didn’t want to have to hassle a return….hint, hint….Target will give full refund and no return hassles….the reason I know this is because I have ordered from them and when the items is not up to par, they do not want their customers to have to deal with anything or be stuck with the item that is not as described…they appreciate our purchases as customersI can not get out and about…so I have to buy almost on line without actually touching or handling something one on one…so as the luck of the draw goes…I do come across an item that is not worthy from time to time, and really appreciate a company who responds wholly to that situation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gaming system for our needs
reviews.reviewText: As we still limit our 6 and 8 year olds screen time, we didn't want to spend the money to get a big system yet This was a perfect compromise and their friends who have bigger systems even enjoy playing the variety of games on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The console is easy to use and has built in battery
reviews.reviewText: Like the product it was for my son he loved to lay the games
Toddlers went crazy for these. I don't really know if they know how to play the games, but there's a lot of choices, beeping, music and they love it! It's just a fun little thing for them.

I bought this last year for my daughter,It cost $16 at the time, and I wasn't expecting much,It came and I was surprised, it's not the best gaming unit, but if you have kids that hate sitting in the car for hours it's worth it.Not even remotely worth $74, as it's very cheaply made, does not come with 100 games, does not have labeled buttons, (one button is just there for show) but worth the $16 I spent on it.

I bought this for my 6 year old for his birthday. After a few months of use it is still working great! Love that there are lots of games to choose from and no wifi required! Great for traveling. Batter my lasts quite a while as well
Good for the age group it’s lightIt’s hard plastic

These games are so great - the kids LOVE it - and play with it everyday! Wasn't sure if it was too young for them (I have one for each of my 8.5 and 11 year old boys) but they seem to like it a lot! Great price and purchase. They have an xbox for minecraft but still like this one for the simple games.Update: 7 months later and the boys are still playing with them and they work perfectly. They even brought it with them camping for when it rained and we ended up staying in the trailer.
